reviews.text: I absolutely loved this museum. I recommend using night mode on camera settings as it was dark for preservation of the beautiful carriages. Not as morbid as you would think! Some really beautiful works of art and pieces. Highly recommended

The museum presents the funeral carriages used in the past. There is no visit fee. 
The museum is located at the entrance to the Montjuic Cemetery.
I could not wait to visit this museum and attached cemetery. Amazing carriages, took my breath away. Highly recommend.
